participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and adventurous, always seeking new experiences.
participant_1.background: I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances. I love to grow sunflowers. I wear my boots as little as possible. My favorite fiction genres are sci-fi and horror. I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Curious and imaginative, with a love for the outdoors and adventure.
participant_2.background: I take the opportunity to go hunting on the weekend. I am in 3rd grade. Being a security guard would be impossible for me if I were blind because I would not be able to see the people I am supposed to be guarding. I once pretended to be a sports fan and told the cop I was on my way to a game. I just docked my boat after a long journey around the world.

content.text: Hello! What are you up to today?
Hey I am just relaxing. How about you?
Same here! I just got back from a long hike.
Wow that sounds nice! Do you like to go hiking often?
I try to go as much as I can. I love being outdoors.
I love the outdoors too. I like to go hunting on the weekends.
Cool! I have never been hunting before. Have you caught anything good lately?
Not really, but it is fun to be out in the woods.
I bet it is. I love being away from everything and just relaxing.
Me too! It is so peaceful out there.
What else do you like to do?
I like to read and play video games.
Oh cool! I love to read too. What are your favorite books?
I like to read sci-fi and horror.
Me too! I just finished reading a really good sci-fi book.
Cool! What was it about?
It was about a group of people who were sent to colonize a new planet.
That sounds cool! I will have to check it out.
You should! It was a really good book.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
